about_the_game:
Fluffwatch is the cozy, casual game where you can finally finalize your dream of becoming a sheep herder and take care of your own cute little farm full of sheep. But be prepared because during the night something might happen to your cute herd of sheep and it is up to you to defend them with all your might!

Develop connections and take are of your sheep during the day by doing different tasks like shearing, giving water, feeding, etc. But be mindful with your time because as soon the night-time begins, the spacing of the game takes a whole different shift.

Key Characters

Sheep
It is up to you to protect them during the night and take care during the cozy day. The mood of the sheep is very dependent on the actions that the player took during the day. Did the player took good care of the sheep during the day? Than the sheep will do everything they can to stay in the farm and avoid the dangers of the night, otherwise they will let themselves get eaten or run away from the farm!

Wolves
These are the dangerous creatures of the night, they will attack your farm when the moon starts to rise and it is up to you to fend them off and make sure nothing happens to your cute sheep.

Dog
The dog guard will be sleeping during the day but that is it will be defending the farm during the night and the player will be controlling the dog during that time period. Scare and attack the wolves and make sure nothing happens to your cute little herd of sheep.

Farmer
You will be controlling the farmer during the day and it's than your job to do different tasks that makes sure that the sheep are very happy and your farm is being defendant against the wolves that will be coming during the night.

short_description: Fluffwatch is a time management, casual, and, cozy game about taking care of a herd of sheep during cozy day and defending them during stressful night from hungry wolves. Make wonderful connections with the animals you take care of and let nothing take them away from you!
